name: Dungeon Twister
description:
Two teams of adventurers with supernatural powers are locked up in the same dungeon. Only one team can walk out. Will it be yours? Choose to flee or to fight. Make the dungeon's rooms rotate to help you advance... or prevent your opponent's progress. Play alone or confront other players on PlayStation®Network in this turn-based strategy game. Welcome to Dungeon Twister!

- A fantasy world in a medieval setting.
- 8 adventurers from a heroic-fantasy universe, each with their own supernatural skills.
- Powerful objects at your disposal: speed potions, magical weapons and accessories, etc.
- 8 rooms which can rotate around themselves, changing the appearance of a game at any time and making each game unique.
- Dozens of training missions against the computer.
- Define your own strategy and measure yourself against other players.
- A best players' worldwide permanent leaderboard.
- Hundreds of hours of gameplay guaranteed!

"Dungeon Twister the Video Game" ©2009 Hydravision Entertainment. Developed and published by Hydravision Entertainment.
Adapted from the board game "Dungeon Twister" ©2004 Christophe Boelinger. Dungeon Twister is a game created by Christophe Boelinger and published by Ludically.
